Package index

Categorical variables

Help to standardise categorical variables.

emend_fct_match()
Match input factor to specified levels.
emend_fct_reorder()
Reorder the levels of the input factor in a meaningful way.
emend_lvl_match()
Match the input factor to supplied levels.
emend_lvl_unique()
Get the unique levels of messy categorical data The returned value is a vector. The LLM will return full names instead of abbreviations. You can use this functions to clean up your categorical data and obtain unique levels. Double check if the output from LLM is true to your data. This function is generally suitable for categories, not working well with sentences and too many categories.

Language translation

emend_translate()
Translate text from one language to another.
emend_what_language()
Identify the language in the text.

Date standardisation

emend_clean_date()
Standardise date format

Address standardisation

emend_clean_address()
Standardise address format

Model settings and options

get_default_chat()
Get or create the default chat object
